1.title: Webapp for newspaper production overview
1.description: Developed a web app using React, Node, MongoDB, Express for my former summer job. Created on my own initiative based on the company's needs.

2.title: Android App Development in Kotlin and Jetpack Compose
2.name: IN2000 Project at the University of Oslo
2.description: Designed and developed a grade A Android app with 5 other students. We became well-versed in app development with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. We also followed scrum and kanban practices as much as we could. I conducted several interviews with veterinarians as data collection for the interview process. My main responsibilities were programming and UX/UI.

3.title: Web demo in React and Node for climate startup
3.name: Clear Karbon Exchange
3.description: Worked with a startup to produce a demo of a carbon credit platform. The web app is built in React with a NodeJS backend and a MongoDB database, allowing for a login system and posting of listings. Focused on the backend.

exchange.title: Exchange in Seoul, South Korea
exchange.subtitle: Korea University
exchange.description: On exchange in Seoul, studying information security, culture, and marketing.

university.title: Bachelor in Informatics: Design, Use, and Interaction
university.subtitle: Department of Informatics / University of Oslo
university.description: Studying the design and interaction between humans and technology at the University of Oslo.

highschool.title: Media and Communication
highschool.subtitle: Hetland Upper Secondary School in Stavanger
highschool.description: Had the opportunity to explore various aspects of media production. Won marketing competitions with Whats Brewing and Stavanger Aftenblad.
